lines:
1956

Roon N. Wayne St,

Kull 9220

Angola, Ind. 
Oct 7, 1911.

My dear Mr. Sharn:

Yours of the 
5th. and a bill reached me 
this morning Many thanks. 
I do not believed this bill. 
belong to me. As I have 
not ordered a single cent 
article from Starin Co. 
game sure that the bille 
belongs to F. Sen. He 
always Ordered many thing 
from that company.
raw: 1956  Roon N. Wayne St,  Kull 9220  Angola, Ind.  Oct 7, 1911.  My dear Mr. Sharn:  Yours of the  5th. and a bill reached me  this morning Many thanks.  I do not believed this bill.  belong to me. As I have  not ordered a single cent  article from Starin Co.  game sure that the bille  belongs to F. Sen. He  always Ordered many thing  from that company.

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter stating that the bill for items from Starin Co. was sent to him in error. He believes that F. Sun has purchased items there.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
